backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining user profiles, challenge sessions with detailed metrics, leaderboard generation, access-controlled queries, and ICP transaction tracking.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old challenge session format to the new metrics-based structure while preserving existing actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their roles, logic, and key behaviors in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme variables and global styles defining light and dark mode color systems using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React application root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, backend actor connection, profile loading, routing, and global error states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright text and caffeine.ai attribution with icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with navigation, user info, admin links, and logout handling based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a modal for creating a user profile, including first-user admin logic and form submission with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/SendICPPrizeModa: Displays a modal to send ICP prizes, handling input validation, balance checks, mutation calls, and success feedback.
frontend/src/config/appIdentity.ts: Resolves backend canister principal and derives the corresponding account identifier using environment variables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, challenge sessions, competition state, and related mutations using an actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for dark and light themes, applying shared background and text colors.
frontend/src/lib/accountId.ts: Implements ICP account identifier generation using SHAâ€‘224, CRC32, and principal-to-hex conversion utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by rendering React with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing competition controls, canister identity, balance, and transaction history with copy and modal actions.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a global leaderboard sorted by XP with rank icons and a return button.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen integrating Internet Identity and showing top public leaderboard entries plus feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenu.tsx: Renders the main menu with navigation cards linking to challenge, stats, wallet, and leaderboard pages.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays challenge session stats, summary metrics, and a history table with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/TypingChallenge.tsx: Implements the typing challenge flow with multiple levels, metrics tracking, alerts, and session saving.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays wallet info, generates account IDs, handles ICP withdrawal UI, and interacts with related backend queries.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines frontend type mappings for user profiles based on backend interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling.
project_state.json: Defines the current TypeFaster project state, including schema version, overall app summary, and a list of existing implemented features with IDs, descriptions, and versions. Serves as a structured inventory of frontend and backend capabilities for planning.
